She states, “I was relieved when I knew I could get micro-loans through Friendship Bridge because it is not easy for other institutions to give loans to widows, and even less if that woman is a farmer." Rosario is currently applying for a new loan, which she will use to buy seeds to grow potatoes, onion, carrot, as well as fertilizers.

Both Rosario and the rest of the ladies in the Trust Bank want to share that being a part of the “Xejuyu Concepcion” as united them even more. Previously, they were just neighbors but now they are friends, companions, confidants and much more. They support each other and practice solidarity. The women want to express their thanks to KIVA investors because without this vital financial support, they would be unable to grow and empower themselves. The benefits trickle down to their families and their community as well. It is a “win-win” situation!

loans.use: to buy seeds to grow potatoes, onions, carrots, as well as fertilizers.

loans.name: Atiocoyo Ix Group

texts.es:
Alcira es una agricultora de 28 años de edad del departamento de La Libertad,pertenece al grupo solidario llamado Atiocoyo IX,los cuales se dedican a la agricultura y a la crianza de ganado.

Alcira esta acompañada, estudio hasta segundo grado, pues tuvo la necesidad de trabajar desde niña para colaborar a la economia familiar, ya que sus padres eran de escasos recursos economicos. Tiene cuatro hijos entre las edades de 5 a 15 años de los cuales los tres menores estan actualmente en la escuela.

Alcira se dedica desde hace 10 años, al cultivo de maiz, frijol,maicillo y a la crianza de ganado, este trabajo le ha permitido poder sostener economicamente a su familia. Solicita el prestamo para comprar ganado, alimentarlo y luego venderlo ya que con esto, ella espera obtener una muy buena ganancia para mejorar la economia de su grupo familiar y poder asi brindarle a sus hijos las oportunidades de estudio que ella no tuvo para que tengan una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Alcira is a 28-year-old farmer from La Libertad department. She belongs to a solidarity group called Atiocoyo IX. They all make their living as farmers and in animal husbandry.

Alcira has a partner. She studied up to the second grade because she has had to to work since she was a child in order to help out with the family finances as her parents had little money. She has four children between the ages of 5 and 15 years old and the three oldest are currently in school.

For 10 years Alcira has made a living growing corn, beans, and sorghum as well as raising animals. This work has allowed her to support her family financially. She is requesting a loan to buy cattle, feed them, and then sell them. As a result of this she hopes to make a good profit and improve her family's finances. She also hopes to be able to give her children the opportunity to study that she did not have and that they have a better quality of life.

loans.use: to purchase cows and feed them for resale.

loans.name: Pablina

texts.es:
La Sra. Paulina es una mujer muy emprendedora, tiene una despensa bien surtida que por medio de su trabajo y esfuerzo ha podido montar. Es muy luchadora y se está esforzando por poder dar a su familia todo lo que necesitan.
Su objetivo es agrandar su local, y a medida que pase el tiempo que sus clientes estén contentos y cada vez tenga mejores ingresos gracias a ellos.  Ella pide de este préstamo para poder invertirlo en la compra de frutas, verduras, productos a granel, carnes, bebidas y demás.
texts.en:
Señora Pablina is a very entrepreneurial woman. She has a well-stocked shop that she has been able to set up through her work and effort. She is very hard-working, and she is striving to be able to give her family everything that they need. 

Her goal is to enlarge her store, and as time goes on and her customers are happy, she will have better and better income thanks to them. She asks for this loan to be able to invest it in the purchase of fruits, vegetables, bulk products, meats, beverages, and other items.

loans.use: to buy fruits, vegetables, bulk products, meats, beverages, and other items

loans.name: Maria

texts.es:
Maria viene de una familia humilde, tiene una heladería donde trabaja toda la familia y recorren en forma ambulante por eventos deportivos. Ella aparte de trabajar también está estudiando la carrera de Ingeniería comercial y comenta que su aspiración es terminar  su carrera y comenzar a trabajar en algo de la rama y de esa manera ser una buena profesional, también tener un ingreso más para su hogar.
Pide este préstamo para poder invertirlo en sus gastos de transporte, ya que le permitirá seguir luchando por sus metas.
texts.en:
Maria comes from a humble family that has an ice cream shop where the whole family works. They also sell as streets vendors for sporting events. In addition to working, she is also studying the commercial engineering curriculum. She comments that her goal is to finish her studies and begin to work in some position in that area and in this way be a good professional, and also to have a better income for her household.

She is asking for this loan to invest it in her transportation costs, since it will allow her to continue working toward her goals.

loans.use: to pay for transportation expenses

loans.name: Rony

texts.es:
El Señor Rony está casado, tiene 35  años de edad, es comerciante y comenta que tiene una librería y fotocopiadora en su casa, y que su esposa la Sra. Maria hace accesorios y artesanías para la venta en su librería.
Comenta que con mucho esfuerzo tanto él como su esposa están luchando por mejorar sus condiciones de  vida, y así poder crecer en su negocio.
Pide de este crédito para poder invertirlo en insumos para su librería, como ser cuadernos, libros, lápices, marcadores y demás, y de esa forma poder seguir con sus ventas. Agradece por esta oportunidad que el y su esposa están recibiendo. En la foto del préstamo aparecen ambos, el Sr. Rony y su esposa que es la codeudora.
texts.en:
Rony is 35 years old and married. He is a businessperson, and says he has a bookstore and photocopier in his home, and that his wife Maria makes accessories and crafts to sell in his bookstore. 

He says that with a great deal of effort, both he and his wife are striving to improve their living conditions and see their business grow. He is requesting this loan so that he can invest it in supplies for his bookstore, such as notebooks, books, pens, markers and other items, and this way be able to continue selling.

He is grateful for this opportunity that he and his wife are receiving.  In the loan photo both appear; Rony and his wife, who is the co-borrower.

loans.use: To buy notebooks, books, pens, markers and other items.

loans.name: Reinerio

texts.es:
El señor Reinerio tiene 30 años, es soltero y vive con su madre en la ciudad de Carapeguá, comenta que desde joven empezó a salir a vender las colchas que ellos mismos producen con su mamá, después de 6 años se independizó y empezó a trabajar por cuenta propia. 
Lleva los productos artesanales a venderlos por las ciudades de Villa Elisa y Asunción, transportándose en su motocicleta que gracias  a este trabajo logró comprarse y también comenta que el ayuda a su mama.
Solicita el préstamo para la compra de hamacas, frazadas y sábanas puesto que tiene muchos pedidos de estos productos.
texts.en:
Reinerio is 30 and single. He lives with his mother in the city of Carapeguá. He says that from a young age he began to go out and sell bedspreads that he and his mother produce. After six years he went out on his own and began to work on his own account.

He brings artisanal products to sell around the cities of Villa Elisa and Asunción, getting around in his motorcycle which thanks to this work he managed to buy, and he also says that he helps his mother.

He is requesting the loan to buy hammocks, blankets and sheets, as he has many orders for these products.

loans.use: To buy hammocks, blankets and sheets.

loans.name: Lolita

texts.en:
Lolita is 66 years old and lives in Guipos, Zamboanga del Sur. She is widowed with six children. Lolita has a shop that sells cloth and dressmaking supplies for products. She has had this business for 10 years. 

Lolita has been a member of PMPC for six years. She requested a loan of 10,000 pesos to pay for dressmaking supplies. In the future, Lolita hopes to have more dressmaking supplies.

loans.use: to pay for dressmaking supplies

loans.name: Elva

texts.es:
Elva es una persona muy trabajadora, que con mucho esfuerzo y sacrificio esta trabajando, es muy luchadora, y cada día que pasa es consciente que debe seguir trabajando. Su anterior crédito de kiva lo uso para poder comprar bebidas, gaseosas, comestibles, etc., lo que le fue de mucha ayuda.
Hoy pide un nuevo crédito, el cual quiere invertir en la compra de mas insumos, como ser gaseosas, frutas, golosinas, y demás, ya que por medio de su negocio podrá seguir trabajando.
texts.en: Elva is a very hard-working person, who is working with much effort and sacrifice. She works hard, and with every passing day she is conscious that she must continue working. She used her previous loan from Kiva to buy beverages, soft drinks, food products, etc., which were a great help to her. Now she is asking for a new loan, which she wants to invest in the purchase of more supplies, such as soft drinks, fruits, candies, and other items, since through her business she will be able to continue working.

loans.use: to buy soft drinks, fruits, candies, and other items for her store.

loans.name: Saidhuja

texts.ru: Саидхуча 1991 года рождения. В 2009 году он поступил в Таджикский Государственный Университет  на юридический  факультет на договорное очное отделение. Сумма договора составляет 900 долларов США. По окончания университета он мечтает стать юристом. До поступления в университет он учился в средней школе.  Саидхуча получил среднее образование. У него имеется аттестат с хорошими оценками. Саидхуча не женат и живет с родителями и братьями. Их 5 человек в семье. Все члены семьи имеют высшее образование. Его родители не в состоянии оплатить за учебу в университет. Он запрашивает кредит на сумму 900 долларов США для оплаты учебы. Он ждет вашу помощь.
texts.en: Saidhuja was born in 1991. Since 2009 he has been attending Tajik State University. He is a law student at the outreach school. The tuition for the outreach school is 900 US dollars. After finishing the university Saidhuja dreams of becoming a lawyer. Before attending the university Saidhuja attending high school and received a high school diploma. He got very good grades. Saidhuja is not married and lives with his parents and brothers, five people total and all family members have a college degree. His parents can't pay for Saidhuja's education. That is why he is requesting a loan of 900 US dollars to pay for his tuition. Saidhuja hopes for your assistance.

loans.use: to pay for his college tuition

loans.name: Virgen Del Carmen Group

texts.es:
El grupo llamado Virgen del Carmen está en el 1º ciclo  del programa de Comité de Mujeres Emprendedoras, donde todas trabajan y se ayudan por salir adelante. La mayoría de las integrantes realizan actividades productivas y las que no, tienen el deseo de emprender una actividad para poder así ir aumentando sus ingresos.
Una de las integrantes la Sra. Heidi se dedica a la elaboración y venta de especias, y el crédito lo solicita para la compra de hierbas naturales.  Ella agradece por la oportunidad que recibe de seguir creciendo.
texts.en:
The group called "Virgen de Carmen" is in its first loan cycle in the Committee of Entrepreneurial Women program, where everyone works and helps the others to advance. The majority of the members have productive activities, and those who don't have the desire to undertake a business activity to thus be able to increase their income.

One of the members of Señora Heidi. She prepares and sells spices, and she is applying for the loan to buy natural herbs. She is grateful for the opportunity that she is receiving to continue growing.

loans.use: to buy natural herbs to make spices.

loans.name: Sofia

texts.en:
Sofia is married with three children. Sofia is 62 years old and lives in the Philippines.                           

Sofia is a farmer and grows corn to earn a living. She has been doing this for 10 years. She has requested a loan of 8,000 PHP to buy fertilizers.                                                                  

Sofia has been a member of PMPC for two years. In the future, Sofia hopes to harvest more corn crops through the Paglaum Co-op (PMPC).

loans.use: to buy fertilizer

loans.name: Eleuteria

texts.en:
Eleuteria earns a living through tailoring  services.  She is 58 years old, married with five children and lives in Ozamiz City, Misamis Occidental, Mindanao: Philippines. She is now well known for the nice quality of tailoring services she offers and is able to save from her work. Her service is self-sustainable and has become profitable, with a net profit of about PHP 5,000 per month.
  
Eleuteria is seeking a PHP 10,000 loan. She would like to use the loan to purchase a new sewing machine for her dress-making business. This is a regular loan and would be repaid in a few months. In her two previous loans, she has never had a delinquency.  Eleuteria is very diligent and loves accuracy, which only adds to the effective management of her venture.

loans.use: to buy a new sewing machine

loans.name: Begimjan

texts.ru: Бегимжан 46 лет, замужем, вместе с супругом воспитали 2 сыновей. Старший сын живет и работает в столице Кыргызстана, помогает материально своей семье, а младший проживает с родителями, помогает по хозяйству. У Бегимжан - среднее образование, в качестве основного дохода для своей семьи Бегимжан занимается животноводством, стартовав 6 лет назад, с покупки скота на 8,000 сом KGS. Благодаря упорному труду Бегимжан, в ее хозяйстве на сегодняшний день имеется:15 овец. Бегимжан занимается перепродажей овец на местном скотном рынке. Закупает овец, откармливает их и перепродает на рынке по высокой цене. Ежемесячный доход составляет 5,000 сом (KGS). В целях дальнейшего развития своего хозяйства, Бегимжан обратилась в Микрофинансовый банк «Бай –Тушум и Партнеры» за кредитом - на покупку овец для откорма с последующей реализацией на рынке по высокой цене. Доходы от кредита Бегимжан планирует вложить в дальнейшее приумножение количества домашней скотины, и намерена собрать средства на покупку автомашины для сына.
texts.en: Begimjan is 46 years old, married and has raised two sons with her husband. The eldest son lives and works in the capital of Kyrgystan and helps the family financially, while the youngest son lives with the parents and helps with the farm. Begimjan has a high school degree and she raises livestock for a living. She started six years ago with 8,000 som KGS. Her diligent work expanded the herd and now Begimjan owns fifteen sheep. Begimjan re-sells the sheep at the local market after fattening them and makes 5,000 som KGS monthly profit this way. In order to further increase her herd Begimjan applied for a loan with micro-finance bank "Bai Tushum and partners" which she will use to buy more sheep. She plans to get more sheep with the profits from the loan and eventually plans to save enough money to purchase her son a car.

loans.use: to buy sheep for fattening and resale

loans.name: Gulbahor

texts.ru: Гулбахор добросовестная и жизнерадостная женщина. Она замужем и на воспитании имеет 2 детей. Гулбахор вместе семьёй живет на северной части Таджикистана. Она занимается собственным бизнесом уже более 19 лет. Гулбахор продает парфюмерия. Она торгует на местном рынке своего района. Гулбахор считает, что женщина всегда должна выглядеть красиво и поэтому она предоставляет качественные парфюмерии для своих покупателей. Гулбахор кредитуется повторно. Она имеет хорошее кредитное досье. Ее сын женится, и она должна провести его свадебное торжество. Однако Гулбахор не имеет денег. Гулбахор запрашивает займ на сумму 2000 сомони для проведения свадебного торжества сына. Она ждет вашу доброту.
texts.en: Gulbahor is an honest and lively woman. She is married and is raising two children. Gulbahor's family lives in north Tajikistan. She sells perfume and cosmetics at the local market and has had her business for more then 19 years. Gulbahor feels that a woman should always be able to look beautiful and she provides her customers with high quality cosmetics. She is a skilled saleswoman and has a great credit record. Since Gulbahor's son is getting married, she is organizing the wedding feast for him, but her savings are not enough to pay for it all. That is why Gulbahor is requesting a loan of 2000 som, which she will use to finance the wedding celebration. She awaits your kindness.

loans.use: to pay for her son's wedding party

loans.name: Jenilyn

texts.en:
Jenilyn is a 32-years-old married resident of Brgy.Manga, Tangub City, Misamis Occidental, Philippines. Her husband is a tricycle driver. They have three children, one of which is in school. Starting with capitalization of 3,000 PHP, she opened a sari-sari (general store) and was able to expand it with the help of Paglaum Cooperative. Aside from financial assistance, she was able to generate savings and enjoys the benefits given by the co-op. She became a member in October 2013. 

Now Jenilyn is applying for 10,000 PHP to purchase additional stocks for her sari-sari (general store), particularly basic commodities.  In the future, she wants to own a mini-mart and will be fully satisfied if she sees her children finish their studies.

loans.use: to purchase additional stocks for her sari-sari (general store).

loans.name: Asuncion

texts.en:
Asuncion is 54 years old and lives in Brgy.Baluc, Tangub City, Misamis Occidental. She is married with two children.

Asuncion is engaged in bananas and buys and sells pigs. She earns approximately 8,000 PHP each month doing this type of work. She has a requested a loan to repair her house.

Asuncion has been a member of PMPC for almost five years. In the future, she hopes to improve her livelihood in order for her children to have a better future.

loans.use: to repair her house.

loans.name: Wilma

texts.en:
Wilma is widowed with five children. She is 31 years old and lives in Baybay Bonifacio, Misamis Occidental, Philippines.

She is a farmer and grows rice to earn a living. She has been doing this for six years. Wilma has requested a loan to purchase additional fertilizer for her rice field.

Wilma has been a member of PMPC for almost three years. In the future, Wilma hopes to purchase another rice field in order for her to provide for the needs of her children.

loans.use: to buy additional fertilizer for her rice field.

loans.name: Zahro

texts.ru: Захро прекрасная женщина. Она пример национальной таджикской женщины. Она трудящаяся и заботливая мать 2 детей. Захро сама обеспечивает своих детей, так как ее муж умер, и она является вдовой. Захро было очень трудно обеспечить своих детей, но благодаря своему трудолюбию она вырастила своих детей. Ее старший сын помогал ей по обеспечению семьи, но данное время он служит в армии. Ее второй сын еще маленький и учиться в средней школе. Захро работает продавщицей в кафе. Она четко выполняет все свои функциональные обязанности. Уже несколько лет ее младший сын нуждается в компьютере, но так как у нее маленькая зарплата, она не в состоянии купить компьютер. Захро запрашивает займ на сумму 1500 сомони для покупки компьютера. Она ждет вашу доброту.
texts.en: Zahro is a wonderful woman. She is an exemplary Tajik lady and a hardworking and caring mother of two children. Zahro is providing for her children by herself as her husband has passed away and she is a widow. It was hard for her to provide her kids with everything necessary, but due to her diligence and hard work she is able to raise them well. Her eldest son also helped his mother to provide for the family, but he has been drafted into the army now. Her second son is too young and still attends school. Zahro works as a saleswoman in a buffet-style restaurant. She diligently performs her duties. Her youngest son has needed a computer for a few years now, but Zahro's small salary made it impossible for her to purchase one. Now Zahro has requested a loan of 1500 somoni which she will use to buy the computer. She awaits your kindness.

loans.use: to buy a computer for her son

loans.name: Mutabar

texts.ru: Добрый человек, который всегда старается улучшить условию проживания, и надеется на светлое будущее, нуждается финансовой поддержки. Ее зовут Мутабар.  Ей 56 лет. Она вдова и имеет 2 детей. Так как она живет в сельской местности, так и имеет хорошую возможность для развития своего бизнеса, скотоводством и земледелием. Она более 15 лет занимается скотоводством и земледелию и имеет большой опыт по данной отрасли бизнеса. Благодаря хорошему состоянию скота, она имеет своих постоянных клиентов. Она хочет развевать бизнес и получать больше дохода. Мутабар запрашивает займ на сумму 2000 долларов США для покупки скота. С полученного дохода он планирует улучшить условию проживания. Он ждет вашу доброту.
texts.en: A kind person who always tries to improve her lot in life and hopes for a better future needs your financial assistance. Her name is Mutabar. She is 56 year old widow with two children. Mutabar lives in the countryside and has good opportunities to expand her business, which is livestock and farming. For more then 15 years she has been a farmer and has a great deal of experience. Her livestock is always in good health and so Mutabar has many regular clients. Mutabar wants to expand her business and have higher monthly profits. She is requesting a loan of 2000 US dollars to purchase more livestock. She plans to use to profits from the loan to improve her living situation. Mutabar hopes for your kindness.

loans.use: to buy cattle and increase her working capital

loans.name: Kara

texts.ru:
Кара 67 лет. Он отец восьмерых детей и дедушка. Все его дети взрослые и уже обзавелись семьями и детьми. Внуки Кара учатся в школе. Кара любит проводить время со своими внуками. Он находит время для внуков и для работы. Кара работает автомехаником. Около 37 лет своей жизни Кара посвятил ремонту машин. Он любит свою работу и в ближайшее время не собирается на пенсию. 
   Кара просит кредит, чтобы приобрести автозапчасти, в том числе помпу, редуктор 3 штуки, поршень, 10 баллонов и нескольких других запчастей.  У Кары мало средств, чтобы совершить закупку. По этой причине он обратился за кредитом. Кара надеется, что ему обязательно помогут. Ведь, мир не без добрых людей.
texts.en: Kara is 67 years old. He is a father of eight children and a grandfather of many. All of his children are grown up and have their own families and kids. Kara's grandchildren attend school. Kara loves spending time with his grand children, but he also finds time for his work. Kara is an auto-mechanic. For more then 37 years he has been repairing cars. He loves his work and is not planning to retire any time soon. Kara would like to take out this loan to purchase spare auto-parts, among them a pump, three reduction drives, a piston, 10 gas cylinders and a few other parts. Since Kara doesn't have many saving of his own he needs to ask for a loan. Kara hopes that he will get help from Kiva because the world is never without kind and good people.

loans.use: to purchase car spare parts

loans.name: Gedion

texts.en:
Gedion is married with two children. He is 25 years old and lives in Mahayag Zamboanga del Sur.

Gedion is a farmer and grows rice in fields to earn a living. He has been doing this for 20 years. He has requested a loan to pay for seedbed preparation and land preparation. Gedion has been a member of PMPC for three years. In the future, he hopes to expand his farm and for his two children to have a good education someday.

loans.use: to pay for seedbed preparation and land preparation.

loans.name: Jocelyn

texts.en:
Jocelyn is 31 years of age and a resident of Baybay Bonifacio, Misamis Occidental, Philippines. She is married with two kids. They have a little crab business from which to earn a living. In their business they meet many challenges, but they realize that it is good to face the challenges rather than get discouraged. 

Jocelyn and her husband work hard in selling their catch to the market. Sometimes there are wholesale buyers from other towns and cities who come to buy their crabs. With their savings, they welcome the idea of expanding their business. They have requested from Paglaum MPC a 12,000 PHP [Philippines pesos] loan. They feel assured of Paglaum’s help, should there be a need for working capital in the future. Jocelyn smiles at the thought of seeing their children get their own diplomas one day.

loans.use: to purchase additional crabs.

loans.name: Elizabeth

texts.en:
Elizabeth is 58 years old and married. She is a resident of Baybay Bonifacio, Misamis Occidental, Philippines. Her husband is a tricycle driver. They have five children, all of whom are in school. Starting with capitalization of 3,000 PHP [Philippines pesos], she opened a sari-sari (general store) and was able to expand it with the help of Paglaum Cooperative. Aside from financial assistance, she was able to generate savings and enjoys the benefit given by the co-op. She became a member in April 2011 and has taken out three loans. 

Now she is applying for 14,000 PHP to buy additional stock for her grocery store, particularly basic commodities. In the future, she wants have a branch of her grocery store someday, and will be fully satisfied if she sees her children finish their studies.

loans.use: to purchase additional stock for her grocery store

loans.name: Kertz

texts.en:
Kertz is married with one child. Kertz is 26 years old and lives in Centro Napu, Tudela, Philippines.

Kertz sells different kinds of products to earn a living and has had this business for two years. Each month, he earns 5,000 PHP [Philippines pesos] doing this type of work. He has requested a loan for 20,000 PHP to buy additional goods to sell such as coffee, milk, cereals, biscuits, Coffee-Mate, snack foods, etc.

Kertz has been a member of PMPC for a month. In the future, Kertz hope to save for future emergencies and expand his sari-sari store.

loans.use: to buy additional goods to sell such as coffee, milk, cereals, biscuits, Coffee-Mate, snack foods, etc.

loans.name: Franklin

texts.en:
Franklin is married with three children. Franklin is 40 years old and lives in Duanguican, Tudela, Philippines.

Franklin sells a variety of products to earn a living and has had this business for three years. Each month, he earns 3,000 PHP [Philippines pesos] doing this type of work. He has requested a loan for 15,000 PHP to purchase additional goods to sell, namely wafers, biscuits, crackers, sardines, noodles, toothpastes, matches, panty liners, and so on.

Franklin has been a member of PMPC for three months. In the future, Franklin hopes to save for his family needs and for his sari-sari store.

loans.use: to purchase additional goods to sell, namely wafers, biscuits, crackers, sardines, noodles, toothpastes, matches, panty liners and so on.

loans.name: Zirila

texts.en:
Zirila is married with 4 children. Zirila  is 66 years old and lives in Tinaclaan, Clarin, Philippines.
Zirila sells a variety of products to earn a living and has had this business for 20 years. Each month, she earns PHP 3,000 doing this type of work. She has requested a loan for 50,000 to purchase additional goods to sell such as bread, milk, coffee, milo, juice, drinks, sweets, candies, etc.
Zirila has been a member of PMPC for 6 years.  In the future, Zirila hope to improve her business and to earn more profit.

loans.use: to purchase additional goods to sell such as bread, milk, coffee, milo, juice, drinks, sweets, candies, etc.

loans.name: Rizalie

texts.en:
Rizalie is 28 years old and lives in Culo, Molave Zamboanga del Sur. She is married with 2 children.

Rizalie has a sari-sari store and sells products such as soft drinks, bread, etc. and earns approximately PHP 5,000 each month doing this type of work. She has a requested a loan to buy a variety of items for her sari-sari store.

Rizalie has been a member of PMPC for 11 months. In the future, Rizalie hopes to improve her business and engage into another business someday.

loans.use: to buy a variety of items for her general store

loans.name: Natalia

texts.ru: Наталье 52 года, не замужем. У Натальи неоконченное-высшее образование, по специальности бухгалтер. На данный момент Наталья работает в сельской управе ответственным секретарем, коллеги отзываются о ней как о трудолюбивой, честной и мудрой женщине. В качестве дополнительного дохода для своей семьи Наталья занимается животноводством, стартовав 22 года назад, с покупки скота на 16,000 сом KGS. Благодаря упорному труду Натальи, в ее хозяйстве на сегодняшний день имеется: 2 дойные коровы и 2 нетели, а также имеет земельный надел размером 3,50 ГА, на котором выращивает ячмень, пшеницу, экспарцет. Ежемесячный доход составляет 20,000 сом (KGS). В целях дальнейшего развития своего хозяйства, Наталья обратилась в Микрофинансовый банк «Бай –Тушум и Партнеры» за кредитом  на покупку бычков для откорма с последующей реализацией на рынке по высокой цене. Доходы от кредита Наталья планирует вложить в дальнейшее приумножение количества домашней скотины.
texts.en: Natalia is 52 years old and single. She has an unfinished college degree and is a professional accountant. Currently Natalia works at the farming co-op's office as a head secretary and her colleagues know her as a hardworking, honest and wise woman. To supplement her salary Natalia raises livestock. She started 22 years ago by purchasing cattle with 16,000 som (KGS). She worked hard to save money and expand her business and now owns two milk cows and two pregnant cows as well as 8.6 acres of land where she grows wheat, oats and feeder legume Onobrychis/Lucerne. Her monthly profits are 20,000 som (KGS). In order to further expand her business, Natalia has turned to the micro-finance bank "Bai Tushum and partners" for a loan. She will use the loan to buy steers for fattening and resale at the livestock market. Natalia plans to invest the profits from the expansion into further growing her herd.

loans.use: to buy steers for fattening and resale

loans.name: Luisa

texts.en:
Luisa is 57 years old. She is married and has nine children. She is in an agricultural business raising livestock in the Philippines. Luisa requested a loan of 5,000 PHP (Philippine Pesos) through NWTF to buy additional livestock to raise.

Luisa has been raising livestock for five years now, and has borrowed five times in the past from NWTF to sustain her business.

In the future, Luisa would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy additional livestock to raise.

loans.name: Marivic

texts.en:
Marivic is married with 3 children. She is 43 years old and lives in Tudela-Tigdok, Philippines.
Marivic is a farmer and grows rice crops to earn a living. She has been doing this for 5 years. She has requested a loan to pay for the redemption of her rice field.
Marivic has been a member of PMPC for 9 years and in the future, she hopes to expand and improve her business.

loans.use: to pay for the redemption of her rice field

loans.name: Armelyn

texts.en:
Armelyn is married with 2 children. She is 34 years old and lives in the Mahayag Zamboanga del Sur.
Armelyn is a farmer and grows rice to earn a living. She has been doing this for 5 years. She has requested a loan to pay for seedbed and land preparation.
Armelyn has been a member of PMPC for 3 years.In the future, she hopes to expand her farm and to provide a good education for her children.

loans.use: to pay for seedbed and land preparation

loans.name: Hazel

texts.en:
Hazel is 44 years old and lives in Blis Culo, Molave Zamboanga del Sur. She is married with 2 children.

Hazel has a sari-sari store (general store) and canteen where she sells items such as soft drinks, bread, snack foods etc. and earns approximately PHP 10,000 each month doing this type of work. She has a requested a loan to buy more items to sell at her sari-sari store.

Hazel has been a member of PMPC for 11 months. In the future, Hazel hopes to improve her business so she can prepare well for her childrens' future.

loans.use: to buy more products to sell at her sari-sari store

loans.name: Clarita

texts.en:
Clarita is 46 years old and married with five children, four of whom are school. Clarita works very hard to provide for them. She runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a loan of 22,000 PHP (Philippines Pesos) through NWTF to purchase additional stocks like sugar, noodles, rice, etc. to sell in her general store. Clarita has been in this business for 26 years.

In the future, Clarita would like to save enough money so she can afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to purchase additional stocks like sugar, noodles, rice, etc. to sell in her general store.

loans.name: Edgar

texts.en:
Edgar is married with 4 children. He is 32 years old and lives in Mahayag Zamboanga del Sur.
Edgar is a farmer and grows rice to earn a living. He also raises pigs for additional income. He has been a doing this  for 15 years. He has requested a loan to pay for seedbed and land preparation.
Edgar has been a member of PMPC for 3 years. In the future, Edgar hopes to expand his farm and to provide a good education for his children.

loans.use: To pay  for seedbed and land preparation

loans.name: Sergia

texts.en:
Sergia is 61 years old. She is married and has six children. 

Sergia is in an agricultural business raising cows in the Philippines. She requested a loan of 6,000 PHP (Philippine Pesos) through NWTF to purchase an additional cow to raise.

Sergia has been raising cows for 30 years now, and has borrowed eight times in the past from NWTF to sustain her business.

She would like to build and expand her business to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to purchase an additional cow to raise.

loans.name: Florencia

texts.en:
Florencia is married and she works hard to support her family.

She has a general store business in the Philippines, and also earns additional income from food vending. Florencia is borrowing PHP 17,000 through NWTF in order to purchase more groceries to sell.

Florencia has been sustaining her business activities through her past 13 loans from NWTF and more recently, through Kiva. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream of saving money to expand her business and repair her family home.

loans.use: to purchase more groceries to sell.

loans.name: Jesselyn

texts.en:
Jesselyn works hard to support her family. She is married and has a tailoring business in the Philippines.

Jesselyn requested a 19,000 PHP loan through NWTF to purchase materials like thread, fabric, needles, etc. for her tailoring business, which she has been in for 15 years now. She would like to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to purchase materials like thread, fabric, needles, etc. for her tailoring business.

loans.name: Josephine

texts.en:
Josephine is 52 years old and has six children. She is married and one of her children is in school.

Josephine is in the agricultural business, buying and selling livestock in the Philippines. She requested a 29,500 PHP loan through NWTF to buy an additional cow, goat and carabao (water buffalo) to sell.

Josephine has been buying and selling livestock for 15 years now, and has borrowed 29 times in the past from NWTF to sustain her business. In the future, Josephine would like to save enough money so she can afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy an additional cow, goat and carabao (water buffalo) to sell.

loans.name: Jean

texts.en:
Jean is 35 years old and married with five children. She earns a living by farming rice in the Philippines. Jean is borrowing 13,000 PHP through NWTF in order to buy fertilizers and other farm supplies.

Jean has been farming rice for 13 years and also earns additional income from a general store. She is working tirelessly toward attaining her dream, which is to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers and other farm supplies.

loans.name: Lilet

texts.en:
Lilet is 40 years old and married with four children who are in school. She works very hard to provide for them.

Lilet runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 8,000 loan through NWTF to purchase additional stock like sugar, rice, oil, etc. to sell.

Lilet has been in this business for five years. In the future she would like to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to purchase additional stock like sugar, rice, oil, etc. to sell

loans.name: Lyndel

texts.en:
Lyndel is 27 years old and married with one child.

Lyndel works hard to provide for her family. She runs a business direct selling Boardwalk and MSE products in the Philippines and requested a PHP 15,000 loan through NWTF to purchase additional stock like shoes, shirts, shorts, etc. to sell.

Lyndel has borrowed and paid back seven loans from NWTF before this loan. She has been running the business direct selling Boardwalk and MSE products for five years.

Lyndel aspires to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase additional stock like shoes, shirts, shorts, etc. to sell

loans.name: Ma. Sol

texts.en:
Ma. Sol is 55 years old and married with three children.

Ma. Sol works hard to provide for her family. She runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 50,000 loan through NWTF to purchase additional stock like biscuits, sugar, rice, canned goods, etc. to sell.

Ma. Sol has borrowed and paid back 33 loans from NWTF before this loan. She has been running the general store for 24 years and also earns an income from food vending and farming sugarcane and rice.

Ma. Sol aspires to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase additional stock like biscuits, sugar, rice, canned goods, etc. to sell

loans.name: Nadina

texts.en:
Nadina is 51 years old and married with eleven children.

Nadina works hard to provide for her family. She runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 8,000 loan through NWTF to buy additional stock like chips, milk, sugar, eggs, noodles, soap, etc.

Nadina has borrowed and paid back three loans from NWTF before this loan. She has been running the general store for five years and also earns an income from rice retailing.

Nadina aspires to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy additional stock like chips, milk, sugar, eggs, noodles, soap, etc.

loans.name: Precile

texts.en:
Precile is 35 years old and married with twelve children.

She earns a living by pig fattening in the Philippines. She is borrowing PHP 10,000 through NWTF to buy additional feed and vitamins for her pigs.

Precile has been pig fattening for seven years and also earns additional income from rice retailing.

She is working tirelessly toward the attainment of her dream of building and expanding her business to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to buy additional feed and vitamins for her pigs

loans.name: Gloria

texts.en: Gloria is 50 years of age, married and blessed with three children. She and her husband aim to improve their standard of living and give their children a better future. She would like to acquire more stocks of grocery items to sell but her capital is not enough to do this. For this reason, she is asking for a loan of PHP 15,000.00 to buy more stocks of junk food, assorted candies, beverages, seasonings, laundry soaps and soft drinks to sell. She's hoping that her business will continue to grow and become more profitable.

loans.use: to buy more stocks of junk food, assorted candies, beverages, seasonings, laundry soaps and soft drinks to sell.

loans.name: Florencia

texts.en:
This is Florencia. She is 58 years old and a resident of Bacoor, Cavite, Philippines. She is married to Rodrigo, a driver and they have children. She and her husband manage their household while operating the business. She is working hard to continually provide income for their everyday expenses.
Florencia operates a variety store. In the Philippines, a variety store is a retail store that sells inexpensive items, often with a single price for all items in the store. It is the place to go to buy one sachet of shampoo, a Php 5-worth of cooking oil, or an egg. She earns a profit by getting supplies at wholesale prices and selling by the piece. Her regular customers are her neighbors and the local community. She earns a minimum of Php 700 in sales every day.
She is requesting a Php 15,000 loan to help her continue the operation of her business. She will use the loan to buy groceries, toiletries and beverages to expand her product inventory.
Florencia dreams that her business will continue to grow and hopes her family can have their own house. She meets up with her co-fellowship* members to share stories of her life and business every week and where she can also draw strength and inspiration from the fellowship and the Word of God she studies.

All CCT community partners / clients are organized into fellowship groups that meet on a weekly basis. A fellowship group is composed of 15 to 30 community partners. The fellowship groups gather each week to study the Word of God, build social capital, and repay Micro Finance loans.

loans.use: to pay for grocery items, toiletries and beverages needed in her business.

loans.name: Batbold

texts.en:
Batbold is 54 years old and lives with his wife and three children in their ger, a traditional nomadic tent, in Zavhan province, Mongolia. His wife Doljinsuren runs their family business manufacturing traditional shoes and boots at home. His three children help their parents with housework and business.

Batbold has been manufacturing shoes and boots at home since 2000. His older children started getting involved in their business and he teaches his children about his business. He is a hardworking, helpful and diligent man who says "I am getting old and soon will not be able to run my business so I need my children to take over the business."

He is now requesting a loan of 1,000,000 MNT to purchase leather and other necessary materials to produce traditional boots and shoes to sell.

loans.use: to purchase leather and other necessary materials to produce traditional boots and shoes to sell

loans.name: Teresita

texts.en:
Teresita is 56 years old, married with one child who is in school. She is a very hardworking entrepreneur.

Teresita has a food vending business in the Philippines. She requested a PHP 12,000 loan amount through NWTF to purchase additional ingredients like rice, sugar, milk, etc.

Teresita has been in this business for 13 years. She would like to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to purchase additional ingredients like rice, sugar, milk, etc.

loans.name: Lucila

texts.en:
Lucila is 53 years old. She is married with six children, two of whom are in school. She is a very hard working entrepreneur. 

Lucila has a business making and selling ice candy in the Philippines. Lucila requested a loan amount of 9,000 PHP (Philippine Pesos) through NWTF in order to buy ingredients for her ice candy.

Lucila has been in this business for eleven years. In the future, Lucila would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy ingredients for her ice candy.

loans.name: Andresita

texts.en:
As a married parent of three children, Andresita works hard to support her family.

She has a business selling frozen foods in the Philippines, and also earns additional income from farming rice, raising chickens and fishing. Andresita is borrowing PHP 30,000 through NWTF to purchase additional sugar, fruits, milk, etc. for her business selling frozen foods.

She successfully paid back her previous loan and now is requesting a new loan to further build her business.

Andresita has been sustaining her business activities through her past 23 loans from NWTF. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream of saving enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to purchase additional sugar, fruits, milk, etc

loans.name: Maribel

texts.en:
Maribel is 34 years old and married with three children.

Maribel works hard to provide for her family. She runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 19,500 loan through NWTF in order to purchase additional groceries to sell.

Maribel has borrowed and repaid twenty-two loans from NWTF before this loan. She has been running the general store for ten years and also earns an income from tricycle transportation.

Maribel aspires to save money so she can afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to purchase additional groceries to sell.

loans.name: Rosario

texts.en:
Rosario is 45 years old and married with five children.

She earns a living by farming rice in the Philippines. Rosario is borrowing PHP 9,000 through NWTF in order to buy fertilizer and other farm supplies.

Rosario has been farming rice for 15 years and also earns additional income from food vending.

She is working tirelessly toward the attainment of her dream of saving money to expand her business and continue to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer and other farm supplies.

loans.name: Rema

texts.en:
Rema is 35 years old and married with two children, one of whom is in school. Rema works very hard to provide for them.
Rema runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 9,000 loan through NWTF in order to purchase more groceries to sell.
Rema has been in this business for five years and sells a variety of items such as bread, soft-drinks and other groceries.
In the future Rema would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase more groceries to sell.

loans.name: Sylvia

texts.en:
Sylvia is 53 years old, married with two children. She is a very hardworking entrepreneur.

Sylvia has a food production business in the Philippines. She requested a PHP 8,000 loan amount through NWTF to buy coconut and ingredients for her food business.

Sylvia has been in this business for four years. In the future, she would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy coconut and ingredients for her food business.

loans.name: Merlinda

texts.en:
Merlinda is 45 years old and married with six children.
Merlinda works hard to provide for her family. She runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 12,000 loan through NWTF in order to purchase more groceries to sell.
Merlinda has borrowed and repaid four loans from NWTF before this loan. She has been running the general store for five years and also earns an income from fish vending.
Merlinda aspires to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase more groceries to sell.

loans.name: Melanie

texts.en:
Melanie is 48 years old and married with five children.
Melanie works hard to provide for her family. She runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 15,000 loan through NWTF in order to buy groceries and feeds for her pigs.
Melanie has borrowed and repaid 13 loans from NWTF before this loan. She has been running the general store for twelve years and also earns an income from farming rice and pig fattening.
Melanie aspires to save money to expand her business and continue to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy groceries and feeds for her pigs.

loans.name: Angela

texts.en:
Angela is a hardworking entrepreneur who buys and sells dried fish in the Philippines.
She is borrowing PHP 12,000 through NWTF to purchase additional dried fish. Angela has been in this business for 5 years. Angela earns additional income from buying and selling pigs and vegetables.
Angela has been sustaining her business activities through her own efforts and with the help of the loans from NWTF. She dreams of saving enough money so she could afford to send her children to college in the future.

loans.use: to buy additional dried fish.

loans.name: Guljahon

texts.ru:
Гулчахон жительница маленького городка Дангара. Ей 42 года. Гулчахон разведена с мужем и воспитывает двоих сыновей одна. Ее старшему сыну 17 лет, а младшему 15 лет. Гулчахон с детьми живет с братом и его семьей в одном доме. Гулчахон зарабатывает путем продажи хозяйственных товаров в основном посуды. Она даже училась в специальном учреждении для освоения маркетинга. Она работает вместе с тетей. Гулчахону нравится ее работа. Она хорошо проводит время и узнает все новое. Ей нравиться продавать новые товары и радовать глаза домохозяек. В свободное время от работы Гулчахон занимается земледелием. Выращивает на земельном участке сельскохозяйственные культуры. 
  На сегодняшний день Гулчахон нуждается в кредите. Она просит в займы, чтобы купить новые хозяйственные товары. Для Гулчахона этот кредит важен. С помощью кредита она сможет приобрести новый товар и увеличить свой доход. Чтобы накопить средств для образования детей.
texts.en:
Guljahon is a resident of the small town of Dangara. She is 42 years old. Guljahon is divorced from her husband and is raising her two sons by herself. Her eldest son is 17 years old and her youngest is 15 years old. Guljahon and her children live with her brother and his family in one house. Guljahon earns money by selling home goods, namely dishes. She even studied at a specialized institute for marketing development. She works together with her aunt. Guljahon likes her work. She has a good time and learns about every new development. She likes to sell new products and appeal to the eyes of homemakers. In her free time, Guljahon practices crop farming. She grows crops on her plot of land. 

Currently, Guljahon needs credit. She is requesting a loan to buy new home goods. This loan is important to Guljahon. With the help of the loan, she will be able to purchase new products and increase her earnings, which will be saved for her children's education.

loans.use: to buy home goods for retail sale.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase forage for his livestock and shoe manufacturing materials for his business.

loans.name: Bienvenida

texts.en:
Bienvenida is thankful for the financial assistance extended to her. She used it in her business, which is an air conditioner repair shop and a loading station. Her loan is also helpful in the education of her child, while her income from her business is supporting their everyday expenses at home. She also has a mini canteen for additional income.
 
She would like to apply for another 30,000 PHP (Philippine Pesos) loan for her to buy electronic load (pre-paid cell phone credit) for different local networks. She will also use the loan in her repair shop and loading station. Her business profits will definitely help her to sustain her child’s education and daily needs. She looks forward to this financial increase with gladness and thankfulness in her heart.

Bienvenida hopes to be more successful in her business and dreams that her child will finish his studies. She meets every week with her co-fellowship* members to share stories of her work and to also draw strength and inspiration from the Word of God she studies. 

* All CCT community partners / clients are organized into fellowship groups that meet on a weekly basis. A fellowship group is composed of 15 to 30 community partners. The fellowship groups gather each week to study the Word of God, build social capital, and pay microfinance loans.

loans.use: to pay for electronic load (pre-paid cell phone credits) for different local networks.

loans.name: El Calvarito Group

texts.es: Este grupo lo conforman tres socias emprendedoras y microempresarias una de ellas es Consuelo tiene la edad de 63 años, acompañada, su negocio es la crianza de cerdo y la elaboración de almidón en su domicilio, lleva dedicándose a esta actividad económica 28 años, tiene a dos personas que le ayudan en sus negocio. El crédito lo está solicitando para la compra de cerdo en pie, purina, para la elaboración de almidón necesita comprar yuca, payana de chicha. Onelia tiene 22 años su negocio es una mini pulpería y Danelia mujer de 30 años su negocio es la venta de verduras.
texts.en:
This group is comprised of three members who are entrepreneurs and small business owners, one of whom is Consuelo, who is 63 and has a common-law husband.  She raises pigs and makes starch at home.  She has been in business for 28 years and has two people who help in the business.

She is requesting a loan to buy a pig and animal feed, as well as ingedients to make starch  Onelia is 22 and has a mini-market and Danelia, 30, has a vegetable business.

loans.use: To buy a pig, animal feed and ingredients to make starch.

loans.name: Manantial Group

texts.es:
Manantial está en el 10º ciclo  del programa de comité de mujeres, todas trabajan juntas y se ayudan para salir adelante. Forman parte del programa de eliminación de pobreza, donde cada una hace la encuesta de eliminación de la pobreza.
Una de las integrantes es la Sra. Teresa, ella se dedica a la venta de comidas como ser empanadas, sándwich de milanesa  etc., ella se destaca por ser una persona que quiere salir adelante, y es por eso que está luchando para poder ir mejorando sus ingresos y los de su familia. Su meta es poder seguir creciendo y superarse cada día más.
Pide de este préstamo para poder invertirlo en la compra de insumos e invertirlo en la compra de carne, verduras, condimentos, harina, huevos, etc. Ellas están agradecidas por la ayuda y las capacitaciones que están recibiendo.
texts.en:
Manantial is in its tenth cycle of the Women’s Committee Program. They all work together and help each other to get ahead. They take part in the Poverty Elimination Program where they take the Poverty Elimination Survey.

One of the members is Teresa, who sells foods such as empanadas, milanesa sandwiches [breaded cutlet], etc. She is well-known for being a person with a strong will to get ahead and this is why she fights to improve her and her family’s income. Her goal is to continue growing and improving more and more every day.

She is requesting a loan to buy ingredients, such as meat, vegetables, spices, flour, eggs, etc. They all appreciate the help and training they are receiving.

loans.use: to buy meat, vegetables, spices, flour, eggs, etc.

loans.name: Cristhian Jose

texts.es: Cristhian Jose, mayor de edad casado,originario de Chinandega, es propietario de un taller de carpintería ubicado en su casa de habitación, donde elabora variedades estilos de muebles como: camas, roperos, milusos, chineros, puertas entre otros, también trabaja como carpintero cuando lo solicitan por trabajos especiales fuera de su taller, Cristhian inicia su negocio gracias a su papa quien fue el que le heredo este taller y asi el comienza a darse a conocer con los clientes, quien hoy en dia su demanda ha incrementado, el objetivo de este crédito es para adquirir materia prima madera debido a que vienen tiempos buenos donde la demanda de muebles se incrementa y así ofrecer variedades estilos de muebles a sus clientes fijos y eventuales
texts.en: Cristhian Jose is married and from Chinandega.  He has a carpentry workshop in his home, where he makes a variety of styles of furniture such as beds, armoires, storage cabinets, china cabinets, doors, and other things.  He also works as a carpenter when he is requested to do work outside the workshop.  Cristhian started his business, thanks to his father from whom he inherited this workshop.  He then began getting to know his customers, whose demand has increased.  He will use the money from this loan to buy supplies and lumber because good times are coming and the demand for furniture is increasing.  This way he can offer a variety of styles to his steady and future customers.

loans.use: to buy supplies.

loans.name: Sara Alicia

texts.es:
Sara es una mujer de 53 años de edad, vive en su casa propia que con mucho esfuerzo de ella y de su esposo lograron hacer, con el sacrificio de sus padres pudo terminar la primaria  para luego dedicarse a trabajar ya que por falta de recursos económicos se vio obligada a hacerlo para poder sustentar sus necesidades.  Su pequeño negocio ha ido creciendo cada vez más,  A pesar de tener un trabajo que le demanda mucho tiempo y esfuerzo, ella se encarga de todos los quehaceres de su hogar, de su esposo y de la  venta de animales menores ya que su esposo tiene un taller mecánico, en la actualidad Sara  y su familia viven en el sector Sur de la ciudad de Latacunga perteneciente  a la parroquia Ignacio Flores de la provincia de Cotopaxi, república del Ecuador.
En cuanto a su economía, podríamos decir que está en un nivel casi bajo, es por eso que  además de su negocio también ha tenido que ver otras fuentes de ingresos adicionales por la venta de sus animalitos como son pollos y cerdos.
Sara solicita este crédito para la construcción del techo en  el taller mecánico de su esposo, cabe recalcar que son una pareja emprendedora. Ellos agradecen a Fundación Alternativa en Ecuador y a Kiva por hacer posible el crecimiento en su vida laboral y personal.
texts.en:
Sara, 53, lives in the home that she and her husband bought through much effort.  Thanks to the sacrifice of her parents she was able to finish primary school; but then she had to work to earn a living.  Her small business has been growing and growing.  Despite having a job that demands much time and effort, she is able to take care of the household and her husband, as well as sell small animals.  Her husband is as merchanic and has a workshop. Sara and her family currently live in the southern part of the city of Latacunga which belongs to parish of Ignacio Flores and province of Cotopaxi, in Ecuador.

As far as her economy is concerned, we could say she is at the lowest level; therefore she earns extra income from sources other than the sale of chickens and pigs.

Sara is requesting a loan to build a roof over her husband's shop.  It is worth mentioning that this couple is very entrepreneurial.  They are grateful to the Fundación Alternativa in Ecuador and to Kiva for making it possible for their business and personal life to flourish.

loans.use: To build a roof at her husband's business.

loans.name: San Francisco Group

texts.es:
San Francisco es de la ciudad de Concepción, una zona un poco alejada de la zona céntrica y aún se encuentra en crecimiento. Es una zona de difícil acceso, por lo que las integrantes de este grupo quieren luchar por ir creciendo y dar a la zona donde viven un mejor ambiente y que vayan creciendo lentamente.
La Sra. Rosa  es una de las integrantes, ella es dueña de su propio negocio, donde vende comidas variadas, y gracias a que le está yendo muy bien se ha hecho de clientela. Su meta es poder seguir creciendo y de esa forma ayudar a su familia. Esta agradecida por la oportunidad que ella y sus compañeras están recibiendo, ya que reciben capacitaciones que les permiten crecer.
Ella pide de este crédito para poder comprar los insumos que necesita para poder hacer sus comidas, como ser carne, jamón, queso, pollo, huevos y demás, y así seguir deleitando a sus clientes con las delicias que hace.
texts.en:
San Francisco is from the city of Concepcion, an area a bit far from the central zone, but that is currently in a state of growth.  It’s an area that’s difficult to access, but the members of this group want to work hard to continue growing and give their area a better environment as it slowly grows.

Rosa is one of the members and owns her own business, where she sells a variety of food.  She has many customers and things are going very well for her.  Her goal is to continue growing and help her family in this way.  She is grateful for the opportunity that she and her fellow members are getting, since they receive training that allows them to grow.

She is asking for this loan so she can buy ingredients she needs, such as mean, ham, cheese, chicken, eggs, and other things.  In this way she can continue delighting her customers with her dishes.

loans.use: to buy ingredients.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To buy organic fertilizer and crop tools.

loans.name: Saniya

texts.ru: Сание 61 год, замужем, вместе с супругом воспитывают 3 детей. У Сании - среднее образование, в качестве основного дохода для своей семьи Сания занимается животноводством. Начала она это дело еще в 1985 году на накопленные денежные средства в сумме 1,000 сом KGS.  Благодаря упорному труду Сании, в ее хозяйстве на сегодняшний день имеется: 4 дойные коровы, 70 овец. Ежемесячный доход составляет 10,000 сом (KGS). Свою деятельность осуществляет на основании своего многолетнего опыта, знает все тонкости своего дела в этой сфере. Многолетний опыт и оптимистичный настрой к жизни призывает Санию к новым достижениям.  И в целях дальнейшего развития своего хозяйства, Сания обратилась в Микрофинансовый банк «Бай –Тушум и Партнеры» за кредитом - на покупку овец для откорма с последующей реализацией на рынке по высокой цене.  Доходы от кредита Сания планирует вложить в дальнейшее приумножение количества домашней скотины.
texts.en: Saniya is 61 years old, married, and together with her husband, is raising three children. Saniya has a secondary education. As the main source of income for her family, Saniya practices livestock breeding. She started this business in 1985 with 1000 som (KGS) of savings. Thanks to Saniya's hard work, she currently has 4 milk cows and 70 sheep on her farm. Her monthly income is 10,000 som (KGS). Her business puts her many years of experience into practice. She knows all of the nuances of the field her business is in. Her years of experience and positive outlook on life have lead her to new accomplishments.  For the purpose of further developing her business, Saniya turned to Microfinance Bank "Bai Tushum and Partners." She is requesting a loan to buy sheep to fatten up and resell at the market for a high price. Saniya plans to invest the earnings from the loan in the further acquisition of livestock.

loans.use: to buy sheep.

loans.name: Flordeliza

texts.en:
As a widowed mother of nine children, Flordeliza works hard to support her family.

She has a cafeteria business in the Philippines, and also earns additional income from fishing. Flordeliza is borrowing PHP 19000 through NWTF in order to buy coffee, sugar, milk and utensils for her cafeteria business.

Flordeliza has been sustaining her business activities through her past eight loans from NWTF. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy coffee, sugar, milk and utensils.

loans.name: Tubemaso Group

texts.fr:
Aline fait partie du groupe  Tubemaso  et  habite à Bubanza. C’est une veuve de 35 ans. Elle a 5 enfants  âgés  de  4 à  18 ans, dont 4 étudient.
Elle a sous sa charge 3 orphelins dont 2 étudient.

Elle fait le commerce des habits et les chaussures  depuis  4 ans. 

C’est son premier    crédit à Turame. Avec le crédit KIVA qu’elle  obtient, elle va  augmenter son capital et acheter  4 douzaines de paires de chaussures à revendre pour gagner plus. 

Dans les prochaines  années, elle voudrait  avoir sa propre  place pour exercer ses activités commerciales .
texts.en: Aline is a member of the Tubemaso group and lives in Bubanza. She is a 35-year-old widow. She has 5 children aged between 4 and 18, four of whom attend school. She is also raising 3 orphans, 2 of whom go to school. She has been selling clothes and shoes for 4 years. This is her first loan from Turame. Her Kiva-sponsored loan will increase her working capital and allow her to buy 4 dozen pairs of shoes to resell, so that she can earn more money. In the coming years, she would like to have her own property in which to carry out her commercial activities.

loans.use: to buy 4 dozen pairs of shoes for resale.

loans.name: Sheria Group

texts.fr: La cliente Kamundu est une commerçante et membre d’un groupe  d’affaires  «  SHERIA», entrepreneur dynamique âgée  de 47 ans et mère de 9  enfants dont tous étudient. Elle est vendeuse  des poissons. Elle a une grande expérience de 14 ans dans ses business. Ce nouveau prêt va l'aider d'acheter  2 sacs de poissons pour accroitre son entreprise. Elle avait commencé ses activités avec le fonds reçu de son mari. Dans l’avenir,  elle rêve devenir une grande femme d’affaires et acheter une parcelle, scolariser et nourrir ses enfants.Son conjoint est un ingénieur en construction. Ainsi, elle remercie Hekima pour son soutien aux femmes  entrepreneurs en leur accordant le crédit sans garantie matérielle et qui sont  exclues  du système bancaire classique.
texts.en: Kamundu, the customer, is a retailer and a member of the Sheria business group. She is a 47-year-old dynamic entrepreneur and the mother of 9 children who all attend school. She sells fish and has 14 years experience in this line of work. This new loan will help her to buy 2 bags of fish so that she can increase her business. She started her business with funds she received from her husband. In the future, she dreams of becoming a big businesswoman, buying a plot of land, feeding her children and ensuring that they get an education. Her spouse is a civil engineer. She would like to thank Hekima for its support of women entrepreneurs who are excluded from the traditional banking system, by giving them loans which do not require tangible security.

loans.use: to buy 2 bags of fish.

loans.name: Adelaida

texts.en: Adelaida runs a buy and sell business, selling fish in the community as to supplement to her husband's income from driving. She has been doing this for twenty years earning a good enough income to cover their basic needs. Adelaida and her husband always find a way to augment their living situation.  She borrowed a loan from GDMPC micro credit to buy more fish to resell. She wants to improve the general living situation of the entire family.

loans.use: to buy more fish to resell.

loans.name: Arieta

texts.en: Arieta is 24 years old and a partnered woman with four children. She runs a small business selling bananas, taamu (giant taro), etc. in her community and has been doing this for many years. To earn extra income, she also has a fishing business. Arieta has requested a loan to buy fishing gear, fishing footwear, and spears for her fishing business and chemicals for her plantation business. She joined SPBD in 2013 to gain access to capital. With her earnings, Arieta will improve her family's standard of living.

loans.use: to buy fishing gear, fishing footwear, spears, and chemicals.

loans.name: La Esperanza 2 Group

texts.es:
La Esperanza 2 es de Ciudad del este, con mucho esfuerzo están trabajando y luchando por salir adelante. Ellas forman parte del programa de eliminación de pobreza, y están haciendo la encuesta de eliminación de pobreza para poder mejorar su situación económica y las de su familia.
Una de las integrantes es la Sra. Nilda, quien es la presidenta de este grupo y lucha por su familia. Ella motiva siempre a sus demás compañeras a seguir luchando y a que cada una invierta su préstamo en sus respectivos emprendimientos.
Nilda pide este préstamo para invertirlo en la compra de insumos para la venta, como ser verduras, azúcar, harina, frutas y demás. Agradece por la ayuda que ellas y sus amigas están recibiendo.
texts.en:
The "Esperanza 2" group is from Ciudad del Este and, with a lot of effort, the group members are working and fighting to get ahead.  This group forms part of the poverty elimination programme and the members are undergoing the poverty elimination survey in order to improve their and their families' financial situation.

One member of the group is Nilda.  She is the president of the group and is fighting for her family.  Nilda always motivates other members of the group to keep fighting and encourages them to invest their loans in each of their businesses.

Nilda is applying for this loan in order to buy supplies to sell. She will buy vegetables, sugar, flour, fruits, and more.  Nilda is grateful for the help that she and her friends are receiving.

loans.use: to buy vegetables, sugar, flour, fruits, and more.

loans.name: Maria Magdalena

texts.es: Maria de 41 años de edad desde hace 9 años se dedica la venta de agua de coco, su negocio lo tiene ubicado una zona muy céntrica, posee mucha clientela por ser un producto muy vendible, con lo que obtiene de su trabajo y con la ayuda de su esposo logran cubrir algunos gastos que se le presentan en su hogar, vive en casa propia con su esposo y sus tres hijos, María está solicitando un crédito para la compra de cocos por mayor para poder seguir con su negocio que le genera buenas ganancias y así poder darle a su familia lo que necesitan sin limitación alguna.
texts.en: For nine years, forty-one-year-old María has been making a living selling coconut water.  Her business is in a very central area and she has many customers, as she has a popular product.  With what she earns at work, and with the help of her husband, María is able to cover some household costs.  María lives in her own house with her husband and three children.  María is applying for a loan in order to buy coconuts in bulk so that she can continue with her business.  The business will then make good profits and so María will be able to give her family everything that they need.

loans.use: to buy coconuts in bulk.

loans.name: Marina

texts.es: Marina de 61 años de edad se dedica a la venta de refrescos como: jugos, gaseosas, agua, etc. desde hace varios años, su negocio lo tiene ubicado en su lugar de residencia, vive en casa propia con sus dos nietos, Marina esta solicitando un crédito para la compra de mas refrescos por mayor para tener surtido con mas productos para darle una mejor atención a sus clientes, ya si poder obtener mejores ganancias para darle a sus nietos una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en: Sixty-one-year-old Marina has been making a living selling soft drinks, such as juices, fizzy drinks, water, and more for some years.  Marina runs her business out of her home.  She lives in her own house with her two grandchildren.  Marina is applying for a loan in order to buy more soft drinks in bulk, in order to have her business stocked up with more products and to give her customers better service.  She can then make higher profits so as to give her grandchildren a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy more soft drinks, such as juices, fizzy drinks, water, and more, in bulk.

loans.name: Virgen Del Lujan Group

texts.es:
Virgen del Lujan forma parte del programa de eliminación, el cual les permitirá conocer la situación en la que cada una está, y de esa forma poder conocer en que trabajar y esforzarse más.
Cristina, una de las integrantes, quien en su  encuesta mostró un nivel de pobreza dentro del nivel uno, es decir, un nivel de ingresos bajos, es consciente que a través del esfuerzo y el trabajo continuo podrá ir mejorando  su situación de pobreza. Ella tiene una despensa, en la que trabaja todos los días desde muy tempranas horas, esforzándose por mejorar y crecer.
Pide de este crédito para poder invertirlo en productos variados, como ser verduras, productos a granel, frutas, aceite, panificados y demás. Ellas gracias a la ayuda que están recibiendo quieren ir mejorando sus ingresos y las de su familia.
texts.en:
The "Virgen del Lujan" group is part of the poverty elimination programme.  This programme allows each of the members to know what kind of situation they are living in, what areas they need to work on, and they know to put in a lot of effort.

One member of the group is Cristina.  Cristina, according to the poverty elimination survey, is living in "level one" poverty, meaning that she has a very low income.  Cristina is aware that, through effort and hard work, she can continue to improve her situation.  Cristina has a shop, where she works every day from early in the morning.  Cristina is putting in the effort in order to improve and grow.

Cristina is applying for this loan in order to invest in various products.  She will buy vegetables, fruits, oil, bread, and other products.  Thanks to the help that they are receiving, the group members are improving their and their families' income.

loans.use: to buy vegetables, fruits, oil, bread, and other products.

loans.name: Keyvin Israel

texts.es:
El Joven Keyvin es una persona muy trabajadora y honesta tiene  23 años de edad, es comerciante y se dedica a la venta de verduras.
Keyvin está solicitando el préstamo para la compra de chiles verdes, tomates, cebollas, papas, etc. y así surtir su negocio y  brindar una mejor atención a sus clientes, también espera que esta inversión le sea de mucha ayuda para obtener los ingresos necesarios para seguir apoyando a su familia en el hogar.
Keyvin su sueño es comprarse una prótesis para su pie izquierdo.

    
Trojes, Honduras - Octubre del 2013.
texts.en:
Young Keyvin is very hard-working and honest.  He is 23 years old and is a businessman, earning a living selling vegetables.

Keyvin is applying for a loan in order to to buy green chillis, tomatoes, onions, potatoes, and more to stock up his business and provide better service to his customers.  Keyvin also hopes that this investment will help him to earn a high enough income to support his family at home.

Keyvin's dream is to buy a prosthetic foot for his left leg.

Trojes, Honduras, October 2013

loans.use: to buy green chillis, tomatoes, onions, potatoes, and more for his business.

loans.name: Atuwezeshe Group

texts.fr: La cliente Ngerereza est une commerçante et membre d’une association  d’affaires «  Atuwezeshe », mariée, âgée  de 25 ans  et mère de 2  enfants qui étudient tous. Elle est vendeuse de friperie depuis 3 ans. ce nouveau prêt va l'aider d'acheter 1 ballon de friperie pour accroitre son entreprise. Elle avait commencé avec de fonds propre reçu de son mari. Son conjoint est un technicien ferrailleur. Dans l’avenir, elle rêve devenir une grande femme d’affaires et acheter une parcelle. Ainsi, elle remercie Hekima pour son soutien aux femmes entrepreneurs exclues  du système bancaire classique. Il sied de signaler qu'une cliente porte son bébé.
texts.en:
Ngerereza is a retailer and a member of the Atuwezeshe business group. She is 25 years old, married and the mother of 2 children who both attend school. She has been selling second-hand clothing for 3 years. This new loan will enable her to buy a bale of second-hand clothing so that she can increase her business. She started her business with funds she received from her husband, who is a scrap metal dealer. In the future, she dreams of becoming a big businesswoman and buying a plot of land. She would like to thank Hekima for its support of women entrepreneurs who are excluded from the traditional banking system.

Note: one customer in the photo is carrying her baby.

loans.use: to buy a bale of second-hand clothing.

loans.name: Gansuh

texts.en:
Mr. Gansuh is 43 years old and lives with his wife and 2 children in a small house in Zavhan province, Mongolia. His wife is teacher at the local public school. His 2 children are local high school students. 

Since 2008, Gansuh has been working at a local mining site as a heavy truck driver during the months of May to October. He provides construction and renovation services in town during his off-duty months. He is a well-experienced, reliable and hardworking man who is now in need of 1,000,000 MNT to purchase construction supplies to finish renovating a house for his client. He is a repeat borrower of XacBank and a responsible and diligent man with good previous loan records.

loans.use: to purchase construction supplies to finish renovating a house for his client.

loans.name: Sharhuu

texts.en:
Mr.Sharhuu is 38 years old and lives with his wife and 4 children in Ger, a traditional nomadic yurt, in Zavhan province, Mongolia. His wife is a farmer and produces organic dairy products to sell to local residents.  His older children are local public school students and his youngest son attends a local kindergarten. 

Sharhuu has been working at a local shoe manufacturing company for years and started producing traditional leather shoes at home at the request of client orders.  He also helps his wife with the farming business.  Since they are both working hard for their family, their income has increased and they put most of their income toward their children's education. 

Sharhuu is now requesting loan 2,000,000 MNT to purchase shoe manufacturing material for his business.

loans.use: to purchase shoe manufacturing material for his business
